ramayana.title: Ramayana
ramayana.author: Traditionally attributed to Maharishi Valmiki
ramayana.description: An epic of dharma, devotion, courage, and righteousness, narrating the life of Lord Rama.

kandas.name: Bala Kanda
kandas.summary: Describes the birth of Rama and his brothers, their childhood, Rama’s training under Sage Vishwamitra, and his marriage to Sita.
keyEvents: King Dasharatha’s desire for children and the Putrakameshti Yagna
Birth of Rama, Bharata, Lakshmana, and Shatrughna
Rama and Lakshmana accompany Sage Vishwamitra
Slaying of demons Tataka and Subahu
Breaking of Shiva’s bow at Sita’s swayamvara
Marriage of Rama and Sita

kandas.name: Ayodhya Kanda
kandas.summary: Focuses on Rama’s exile, the grief of Ayodhya, and the loyalty of Sita and Lakshmana.
keyEvents: Rama chosen as the crown prince
Manthara persuades Queen Kaikeyi to demand Bharata’s coronation
Kaikeyi asks for Rama’s 14-year exile
Rama leaves for the forest with Sita and Lakshmana
Dasharatha dies of grief
Bharata refuses the throne and takes Rama’s slippers as a symbol of his rule

kandas.name: Aranya Kanda
kandas.summary: Describes the life of Rama, Sita, and Lakshmana in the forest and Sita’s abduction by Ravana.
keyEvents: Meeting sages in the forest
Encounter with demoness Shurpanakha
Slaying of Khara and Dushana
Golden deer incident
Ravana abducts Sita
Jatayu tries to rescue Sita but is fatally wounded
Rama and Lakshmana search for Sita

kandas.name: Kishkindha Kanda
kandas.summary: Rama allies with Sugriva and the Vanara army to search for Sita.
keyEvents: Meeting Hanuman
Alliance with Sugriva
Rama kills Vali and restores Sugriva’s kingdom
Search parties sent across the world
Hanuman discovers Sita’s location in Lanka

kandas.name: Sundara Kanda
kandas.summary: The heroic adventures of Hanuman as he leaps to Lanka, meets Sita, and delivers Rama’s message.
keyEvents: Hanuman leaps across the ocean
Encounter with Surasa and Simhika
Entering Lanka
Meeting Sita in Ashoka Vatika
Burning of Lanka after being captured
Return to Rama with Sita’s message

kandas.name: Yuddha Kanda
kandas.summary: The great war between Rama and Ravana leading to Sita’s rescue.
keyEvents: Rama builds a bridge (Setu) to Lanka with the Vanaras
War between Rama’s army and Ravana’s forces
Indrajit’s illusions and Lakshmana’s injury
Hanuman brings the Sanjeevani herb
Lakshmana kills Indrajit
Rama kills Ravana
Sita proves her purity through Agni Pariksha

kandas.name: Uttara Kanda
kandas.summary: Events after Rama's coronation, including Sita’s departure, the birth of Lava and Kusha, and Rama’s final ascent.
keyEvents: Return to Ayodhya and Rama’s coronation
Sita goes to Sage Valmiki’s ashram
Birth of Lava and Kusha
Singing of the Ramayana by Lava and Kusha
Sita returns to Mother Earth
Rama ends his earthly incarnation

mainCharacters.name: Rama
mainCharacters.role: Prince of Ayodhya, incarnation of Vishnu, hero of the epic

mainCharacters.name: Sita
mainCharacters.role: Wife of Rama, incarnation of Goddess Lakshmi

mainCharacters.name: Lakshmana
mainCharacters.role: Rama’s loyal brother and companion during exile

mainCharacters.name: Hanuman
mainCharacters.role: Devotee of Rama, central figure in the search for Sita

mainCharacters.name: Ravana
mainCharacters.role: King of Lanka who abducts Sita, antagonist

mainCharacters.name: Bharata
mainCharacters.role: Devoted brother who rules Ayodhya in Rama’s name

mainCharacters.name: Sugriva
mainCharacters.role: King of the Vanaras who helps Rama

mainCharacters.name: Vishwamitra
mainCharacters.role: Sage who guides Rama in his youth

mainCharacters.name: Dasharatha
mainCharacters.role: King of Ayodhya and father of Rama
